name: vmwHostBusAdapterTable
description: Inventory of Host Bus Adatpers found in this system. CLI: esxcfg-scsidevs -a VIM Parent Container: https://esx.example.com/mob/?moid=storageSystem VIM property: hostBusAdapter MOB: https://esx.example.com/mob/?moid=storageSystem&doPath=storageDeviceInfo

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.5.2.1.1.name: vmwHostBusAdapterIndex
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.5.2.1.1.description: An arbitrary index assigned to this adapter.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.5.2.1.2.name: vmwHbaDeviceName
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.5.2.1.2.description: The system device name for this host bus adapter.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.5.2.1.3.name: vmwHbaBusNumber
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.5.2.1.3.description: The host bus number. For unsuported HBA's reports -1.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.5.2.1.4.name: vmwHbaStatus
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.5.2.1.4.description: The operational status of the adapter.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.5.2.1.5.name: vmwHbaModelName
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.5.2.1.5.description: The model name of the host bus adapter.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.5.2.1.7.name: vmwHbaPci
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.5.2.1.7.description: The Peripheral Connect Interface (PCI) ID of the device.
